ComicInfo.Summary:
Truths have been recently been revealed to Skye. One of the many secrets inside the book has made itself known, but what does this mean for the Guardian of the Nexus? And what other mysterious figures are lurking in the darkness? What are their intentions? Is Skye ready for what comes next?
Find out in this next canâ€™t-miss issue of Grimm Fairy Tales!
